feed.title: Ankush Pratap Singh
feed.subtitle: This is the personal bio of Ankush Pratap Singh. I am a computer engineering graduate from New York University with a master's degree. My passion lies in the fields of machine learning, deep learning, and computer vision. With a strong interest in these areas, I strive to explore innovative applications and advancements that drive the future of technology. I am a prospective Phd student.

entry.title: Exciting News! Thesis Defense Success!
entry.summary: I am absolutely thrilled to announce that I have successfully defended my thesis! It is with immense joy and gratitude that I share this milestone in my academic journey. After months (and even years) of hard work, research, and dedication, I can finally say that I am officially a proud defender of my thesis! This momentous occasion marks the culmination of countless hours spent poring over li...

entry.title: Joined AI4CE lab
entry.summary: I am very happy to announce that I have joined AI4CE Lab (headed by Prof Chen Feng) and Iâ€™ll be doing my research under the guidance of Prof Chen Feng and Chao Chen (Phd student)starting Fall 2022. Iâ€™ll be working on the creation, modelling and analysis of different deep learning architectures for Scene Summarization project.
